addon.name: Compo PIM Synchronization
addon.description: Синхронизация каталога товаров с Compo PIM

queries.item:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:pim_sync_state` ( `sync_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `entity_type` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `entity_uid` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `cs_cart_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `last_sync` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `sync_status` enum('synced','pending','error') DEFAULT 'pending', `error_message` text, PRIMARY KEY (`sync_id`), UNIQUE KEY `entity_uid` (`entity_type`,`entity_uid`), KEY `cs_cart_id` (`cs_cart_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:pim_sync_log` ( `log_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `sync_type` enum('full','delta','manual') NOT NULL, `started_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `completed_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, `status` enum('running','completed','failed') DEFAULT 'running', `affected_categories` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `affected_products` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `error_details` text, PRIMARY KEY (`log_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `?:pim_sync_state`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `?:pim_sync_log`;
